proof.title: The Horizon
proof.description: there is horizon, which is an apparent line that separates earth from sky.

proof.title: The Shadow
proof.description: shadow falls in different sides of the earth are of different angle, from which its possible to measure the curvature of the globe.

proof.title: Other Planets and Stars
proof.description: all other planets and stars in visible space are round.

proof.title: Timezones
proof.description: the time is different at different places on earth.

proof.title: Non-Euclidean Geometry
proof.description: the geometry based on plane doesn't apply on big scale due to roundness of earth.

proof.title: Lunar Eclipse
proof.description: when a lunar eclipse occurs, its visible on the moon that the shadow of earth is curved.

proof.title: The Coriolis Effect
proof.description: freely moving phenomenons like floating water and hurricane winds are deflecting to the right on the north of the equator, while its reverse on the south of it.
